name: Cooking Scramble: BBQ! 2 - Burger Fever Food Chef
name_original: Cooking Scramble: BBQ! 2 - Burger Fever Food Chef
description:
MILLIONS of people have downloaded and enjoyed the "Food Court Fever" game series and now you get to enjoy our best new cooking game: "Cooking Scramble: BBQ! 2 - Burger Fever Food Chef" for FREE!!!

You are a chef hired to manage a chain of restaurants and you get to COOK YUMMY FOOD from customer orders to make them happy, fast! With proper time management, you can upgrade your cooking ingredients, buy more restaurants, get more customers, manage more orders, and earn more gems! Have fun cooking yummy food orders as you upgrade your skills and decorate your own restaurants!

"Cooking Scramble: BBQ! 2 - Burger Fever Food Chef" will serve you hours of food cooking game fun for the whole family, to master a deliciously addictive time management game!

FEATURES:
• Happily play 70 levels!
• Feed the world: 7 restaurants to unlock!
• Unlock tons of yummy ingredients!
• Upgrade your time management game skills and cooking skills!
• Earn gems to decorate your restaurant!
• PLAY MINI GAMES!

So, you think you have the skills to take orders, be a delicious fast food chef, and world master of your restaurant? PLAY NOW to challenge your fast food culinary skills! Get ready for delicious cooking game HAPPINESS with "Cooking Scramble: BBQ! 2 - Burger Fever Food Chef"... The more you play this family fun time management game, the gems you get, the more yummy ingredients and customers you unlock, the better your skills, the more HUNGRY kids you help feed in the world, and the more happy FUN you have!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/Flowmotionentertainment
Checkout Backpack Buddies! https://www.backpackbuddies.ca
